name: Armor Mayhem
storyline: When Earth is depleted of energy and resources, huge companies set out on an expeditionary venture together to find a new source of energy for the human race. After years of searching they finally find a crystalline source of infinite energy on a far-away planet. Instantly corrupted by its power, they turn on one another. And so begins the company-company war that the series revolves around.
summary: Armor Mayhem is a side-scrolling shooter game developed by Louissi. It features a full-fledged campaign, which is played both to progress through the story and earn money which is used to purchase new weapons and armor from the armory.
